CRD_SecondNight.synopsis: Player approaches Lae'zel to enjoy a second night of romance, which will be implied offscreen. This could either trigger at the party if the player already slept with Lae'zel, or any other time between her act 1 and 2 romance scenes. To set the feeling of the sexual relationship becoming a regular thing.

CRD_AfterRomance2.synopsis: Laezel gets more intimate with the player after their second romance scene.
CRD_AfterRomance2.how_to_trigger: Triggers after the Romance 2 scene for Laezel, one of the next nights you go to camp.To debug trigger, use the Origin Debug Book (Ctrl + Shift + 7)  to trigger it by selecting

CRD_SecondNight_2.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_SecondNight_2.text: Ever since we shared each others' flesh, I've caught you looking at me with lidded eyes.

CRD_SecondNight_4.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_SecondNight_4.text: And either like a coward or a fool, you tremble.

CRD_SecondNight_5.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_SecondNight_5.text: Perhaps the parasite has weakened you. Or perhaps - perhaps you still long for my taste.

CRD_SecondNight_17.speaker: Player
CRD_SecondNight_17.text: I have been hoping we could spend the night together again.

CRD_SecondNight_31.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_SecondNight_31.text: I never promised more than a night - though I can't deny the lure of your taste. Sweet, yes, but also bitter as ginger.

CRD_SecondNight_27.speaker: Player
CRD_SecondNight_27.text: The sex gets better the more experience you have with someone.

CRD_SecondNight_32.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_SecondNight_32.text: Like the shield-bearer and pikeman must train to march their formation in tandem.

CRD_SecondNight_21.speaker: Player
CRD_SecondNight_21.text: Deep down, you like me more than anyone else here.

CRD_SecondNight_29.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_SecondNight_29.text: You are exceptional amongst our pack. You are clearly their leader, and they look to you for guidance. That, I admire.

CRD_SecondNight_20.speaker: Player
CRD_SecondNight_20.text: You're free to be with who you choose, but I hope you'll choose me.

CRD_SecondNight_28.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_SecondNight_28.text: Yes. I have the pick of Faerûn's litter, though all I see are runts. They are the rule; you are the exception.

CRD_SecondNight_16.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_SecondNight_16.text: Very well. I will claim you once you have taken to rest.

CRD_SecondNight_33.speaker: Player
CRD_SecondNight_33.text: Only if you promise to stick around for a cuddle afterwards.

CRD_SecondNight_23.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_SecondNight_23.text: Why would a lesser act spark greater desire in you?

CRD_SecondNight_0.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_SecondNight_0.text: Chk. Overheated grappling, that wastefully eats into time better spent resting our muscles.

CRD_SecondNight_11.speaker: Player
CRD_SecondNight_11.text: You've never done it before, have you?

CRD_SecondNight_8.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_SecondNight_8.text: And you've never strangled a Berbalang with your bare hands.

CRD_SecondNight_24.speaker: Player
CRD_SecondNight_24.text: I want to press my head to your chest and feel the war drum of your heart.

CRD_SecondNight_13.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_SecondNight_13.text: I remember your heartbeat from before. Quick, light, like a frightened rabbit.

CRD_SecondNight_9.speaker: Player
CRD_SecondNight_9.text: Shouldn't we enjoy all the sensations of Faerûn while we are here?

CRD_SecondNight_6.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_SecondNight_6.text: Have the curiosities of this land muddled your head? Bah - at least you are choosing to lay with me instead of one of them.

CRD_SecondNight_39.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_SecondNight_39.text: I'll keep your request in mind. Perform well, and perhaps I'll consider it.

CRD_SecondNight_18.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_SecondNight_18.text: Enough! I have given you my word. Do not be late.

CRD_SecondNight_30.speaker: Player
CRD_SecondNight_30.text: I look forward to it dearly.

CRD_SecondNight_7.speaker: Player
CRD_SecondNight_7.text: On second thought, I'd rather be alone tonight.

CRD_SecondNight_1.speaker: Player
CRD_SecondNight_1.text: You've read this all wrong. I'm not interested, Lae'zel.

CRD_SecondNight_12.speaker: Player
CRD_SecondNight_12.text: It is foolish of me. I promise I shall stop.

CRD_SecondNight_25.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_SecondNight_25.text: I did not say it was unwelcome. Should a warrior not enjoy the flattery of her admirers?

CRD_SecondNight_10.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_SecondNight_10.text: Besides, I can't deny the lure of your taste. Sweet, yes, but also bitter as ginger.

CRD_SecondNight_35.speaker: Player
CRD_SecondNight_35.text: I think you're mistaken, I've been having no such thoughts.

CRD_SecondNight_22.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_SecondNight_22.text: Just when my tongue was craving a second sample.

CRD_SecondNight_38.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_SecondNight_38.text: Chk - to think you'd starve yourself while gazing at a feast luscious as this.

CRD_AfterRomance2_17.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_AfterRomance2_17.context: NodeContext: Zhahk Voh-nahsh DOO. (Source of my bruises, a pet name of sorts.)

CRD_AfterRomance2_20.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_AfterRomance2_20.text: I thought I'd seen the whole of you. Mighty as Tiamat's dragons, monumental as the One in the Void.

CRD_AfterRomance2_7.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_AfterRomance2_7.text: But now I see more in you still. You are iron and steel, yes - but you are also silk and satin.

CRD_AfterRomance2_2.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_AfterRomance2_2.text: Soon, I would know you again. Not to claw you, but to caress you. Not to be burned in your heat -

CRD_AfterRomance2_6.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_AfterRomance2_6.text: - but to be bathed in your warmth.

CRD_AfterRomance2_13.speaker: Player
CRD_AfterRomance2_13.text: I prefer heat. Ravage me, show me no mercy.

CRD_AfterRomance2_12.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_AfterRomance2_12.text: Mm. You crave the icy heat of iron and steel.
CRD_AfterRomance2_12.context: NodeContext: Disappointed but about to give their lover more than they bargained for.

CRD_AfterRomance2_0.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_AfterRomance2_0.text: Then I will give you that, and more. I will burn you, bite you, brand you with the wounds of my obsession.
CRD_AfterRomance2_0.context: NodeContext: Now fully into really letting go with the player

CRD_AfterRomance2_4.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_AfterRomance2_4.text: I expect you to do the same. Leave your mark. Be the source of my bruises.

CRD_AfterRomance2_9.speaker: Player
CRD_AfterRomance2_9.text: Yes. I've longed for a tender touch.

CRD_AfterRomance2_3.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_AfterRomance2_3.text: Truthfully, it took more courage to ask for a soft touch than it would to meet the gaze of the Ninefold Dragon.

CRD_AfterRomance2_16.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_AfterRomance2_16.text: Thus far I've taunted you, devoured you, battled you.

CRD_AfterRomance2_21.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_AfterRomance2_21.text: Now, I want more than anything to soothe you.

CRD_AfterRomance2_8.speaker: Player
CRD_AfterRomance2_8.text: Maybe another time. I need rest, not sex.

CRD_AfterRomance2_14.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_AfterRomance2_14.context: NodeContext: With some disappointment but not too much

CRD_AfterRomance2_18.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_AfterRomance2_18.text: Let us hope, then, that time does not too quickly run out.
CRD_AfterRomance2_18.context: NodeContext: With some disappointment but not too much

CRD_AfterRomance2_1.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_AfterRomance2_1.text: I've been pierced by a beholder's rays and sliced open by a neogi's talon. But this wound will run much deeper.

CRD_AfterRomance2_15.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_AfterRomance2_15.text: Our flesh-bond is broken, but our alliance is not. Our kinship will be the blade that cleaves the our enemies.
CRD_AfterRomance2_15.context: NodeContext: Pulling herself together after being broken up with

CRD_AfterRomance2_5.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_AfterRomance2_5.text: You are still my friend, my fellow warrior. And still the source of my bruises.
CRD_AfterRomance2_5.context: NodeContext: A thoughtful final word on the breakup
